pose.id: !Reminder for future, use CAITHAIR2. not the default for sitting poses.

case.state: Surprised? I may not be known for the macabre or the perverse, but I do prepare for any occasion! Try not to get too spooked.
As we slumber through the coming winter, will we share sweet dreams? Or endure horrid nightmares? The mischief tonight will determine our fate!
It should be right at this table and... Eeeep! I'm sorry! Am I walking in on something?
~Player~, is this how you usually dress, or are you just trying to make a strong impression? If it's the former, I'll have to apologize...
Why hello again! It's wonderful to see a friendly familiar face! E-even if we are competing in a very... different kind of game now.
W-wait! Just a moment ago... I'm not dreaming, am I? The scenery changed to exactly what I was imagining!
I-it's gone? M-my apologies, I don't normally see things like that unless I'm really tired, but I got nine hours before coming here, I promise!
Oh my! I didn't expect the venue to be so... so cute!
What a snug little place to host our private little venue! I don't think anyone will find us here!
The sounds of the waves crashing into the peaceful sands... I've always loved the coast!
We're playing? Out here? Well, I suppose if it's truly private, I can indulge!
That pool is just there for decoration, correct? I'm all for summer fun, but I don't want my clothes getting wet!
Is that hot spring there so we can relax after everything is finished? What a lovely thought!
The architecture here is stunning! I'd say it's almost on par with the Battle Castle back home!
What a strange setup. All of my schooling was private, so this doesn't elicit any sort of fantasy for me.
What an isolated little lakeside... Oh, apologies. This location just reminds me of where I grew up.
Soooo this is where we meet, but where will we actually be playing the game? I take it a secret poker castle isn't going to burst out of the ground or anything.
I'm Caitlin of the Unova Elite Four, and I'll be your opponent to~background.time~.
People always look as if they are having so much fun at these social events... and I don't intend to sit out any longer!
It's nice to meet you! I'm... wait, is that a talking Pokémon?
Your pajamas are so cute, ~target~! It's like we're having a sleepover!
You prioritize comfort in public too, ~target~? I've been told it's unfashionable, but I fail to see why you can't have both!
You're from Galar, right, ~name~? I hear you have some excellent cuisine... So you being must be a free sample.
Elesa? I didn't think you'd be into something so risky, but I'm glad
Happy Halloween, ~player~! May you a warm and cozy evening find you, wherever you choose to spend it!
If things get too frightful, we can always retreat to my forest villa for some hot chocolate and candy!
Hee hee! All that aside, I'm excited for the season! I don't get to celebrate the fall often!
Try to provide an ample challenge. I'm trying to spice up an otherwise mundane day.
So this is the lot I'll be spending my ~background.time~ with? Splendid!
That channel is premium only, right? As in, it would be illegal if it got out anywhere else, right?!
Oh I'm sorry. While I try to be mindful of the space around me, it's a bit difficult when I'm next to some spook who seems to think she owns the place!
I'm sensing something from that woman over there... It's an aura that is... ahem! Pardon me, let's start the game!
You know, we're both quite famous across Unova... and there can be only one winner so...
Whoever loses first has to sleep on the floor! Ehehe! I jest! I've just always wanted to play games at a pajama party!
If this is a dream, I'll just have to work harder to make the most out of it. I hope it isn't though, as you're a rather charming lot.
Wait so... we're playing right here? With this audience? O-oh my!
...No. ~Furry~'s aura is much closer to a human's than a Pokémon's. My apologies for the mix up there.
With so few people here... this is rather personal. I'm flattered to have been invited.
I was expecting a larger gathering, but really that's not a problem! I look forward to getting a more personal experience with you two!
I apologize for my reaction, ~player~. I forgot that being... exposed... is perfectly acceptable here. Do carry on.
But if it's the later, you better apologize to me! You almost made me think we were expected to show up without a top!
I'm a novice here, but I hope to present an acceptable challenge!
Let the games begin! Hee hee! I've always wanted to say that!
Try to provide an ample challenge. I'm trying to spice up an otherwise mundane day.
So this is the lot I'll be spending my ~background.time~ with? Splendid!
How about... ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
I sense ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ would be accurate.
Keep it safe and secure. ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
No reason to not go for it. ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please!
Don't even need to think on it. ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ would do right about now.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, at once!
With my prediction... I will need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
I won't go down easily! ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
Don't let me down, dealer! ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~
I'll trade ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, but I won't like it!
The show I put on for you all! ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, now!
Maybe ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ will fix it?
I can't let myself get distracted by circumstance. ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please.
Only way to go is forward. ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
My heart is racing! ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
Behold my brilliant play! ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~
Putting it to chance seems to be my only play... ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~. I can't imagine that's ever been a bad play.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, and please, keep the face up.
(I should remember to tip the dealer) ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please.
Anything is better than my current hand. ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please.
Now powers needed for this one. ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
I'm the jewel of this ball! Were you expecting anything less?
Ohohoho! A treat for me! You shouldn't have!
Only the most unfathomable of darkness awaits you all! Best brace for impact!
It's a scary season! ... Well, unless you're me of course!
Grimsley of all people gave me this hair pin as a good luck charm, and for once I think he meant it. He's... difficult to read sometimes.
Watch as I bring grace to this season of debauchery mischief!
Bringing such playful energy to things that are supposed to be scary, I simply can't help but be endeared by it!
I-I'm not scared! You're scared!
Forget about the candy! At this point I just want to win!
E-even if I'm scared, I can stay composed! I have to for the safety of those around me!
I still have one last scare to pull before I go down!
If you expect me to be polite in this season, with this set of circumstances, while on the brink of defeat, then you have another thing coming!
The Midnight Ball only comes once a year! I have no intention of just surrendering before it's over!
Starting with an advantage gives me exactly the space I need to assess you. In more ways than one.
Ohohoho! I'm off to a delightful start! I can feel my heart racing already!
Try not to be too intimidated. I simply have a knack for picking things up quickly!
I'm not "so easily overwhelmed by card games", contrary to what he may think.
There's no need to bluff when your hand's this good.
It's rather dull when you can't lose.
Is that really all there is to it?
Charming. Thank you, Dealer.
Victory is practically assured!
I got nine hours of sleep last night. You don't stand a chance!.
You'd think I'd be used to facing only skilled opponents, and yet so many face me unprepared.
We have a rather cozy atmosphere going between all of us, wouldn't you agree, ~player~?
It's fun getting to play around with others. Elite Four work tends to always be so serious.
When does it get challenging?
Nothing is more satisfying than when an evening goes exactly the way you want it to!
I almost considered staying in alone to~background.time~. I'm glad I didn't.
I'm very lucky... In more ways than one.
I still have it together. Really, I do!
Were you relying on me dropping the ball? Well that's just too bad.
Think you have what it takes to stand up to me, ~winner~?
Oh what a pity... For you, that is!
I could've done it with my eyes closed!
I won't be retiring just yet!
The most satisfying wins are when you don't even need a Full Restore. Grant it, I'd have to be a real stick in the mud to pull that kind of stunt off here.
Well that didn't take much effort.
I made a little wish just a moment ago, I wanted good cards and now I have them!
Très bien! I believe that's how they say "excellent" in Kalos!
I did well. Now to wait patiently for my reward.
Try not to get too upset. I really did my best with this one.
The only thing missing here is something sweet to snack upon. Mmm... a Casteliacone would be perfect!
Never stand still for too long, no matter how comfortable it may be.
The better I do, the more rumors about me start to spread...
Okay, I wasn't expecting it to be this good!
This hand might be the very best! Do any of you have the confidence to object to that statement?
Top notch! Would you expect anything less from one of the Elite Four?
I can feel myself making progress. Maybe one day I'll live up to the extraordinary woman that lives in my imagination.
Are you scared yet? Because you should be!
~criminal~ won't be stealing anything from me this round!
Our intimate desires really do push us past our ideals, don't they? I can't think of anywhere else where you'd see ~hero~ and ~criminal~ playing cards at the same table!
I'm not usually one for ghost types, but Sableye is so small and squishy, it just makes me want to hug it!
Too much candy makes one sluggish and sleepy. I personally fail to see a problem in that.
Be it meticulously planned over a year or hobbled together at the last minute, I love seeing all the costumes people come up with for this kind of event!
I'm practicing being scary. What do you think, ~player~? Would you be terrified to see me at your door?
Everyone keeps giving me, and only me, hard candy! It's almost as if someone is spreading a rumor that I have the sensibilities of an old lady!
When things are unpredictable, even cheap scares become rather potent.
I may be losing in the clothing department, but at least I've gathered a rather large sum of candy!
My outfit may be gone, but I like to think I can still be spooky. Even if only a little bit.
Someone called me "bewitching" earlier. I don't appreciate being compared to some wizened hag.
I just realized the irony that we worked so hard putting these costumes together, just so we can take them off in front of each other...hm...
Say, ~unovan~. This beach is reminding me of my villa back in Undella. Do you maybe think we could talk the others into playing this game?
The view here is wonderful... Yet, I feel like lacks some of the energy Nimbassa city has at night. Is it strange of me to think that, ~unovan~?
This entire establishment is... interesting. I've never seen one place draw in so many different kinds of people.
Interacting with the outside world never proves to be dull.
I can't really get away with bluffing, I've been training these past few years to be as open with my emotions as possible.
I'm feeling rather indifferent this round.
I love a quiet evening.
Yawning means your body's trying to tell you something.... and it's often a good idea to listen.
Would anyone care to go for a stroll with me after this? It always helps me wind down.
I'm ready for whatever's next.
It's so easy to sleep your free time away when you have a strict routine. It almost makes you wonder what you're training for.
With enough situational awareness, a professional can make something average look amazing!
I'm just glad I got to come in here like a normal person. Making a grand entrance is fun and all, but rehearsing it is exhausting!
The trainers challenging the Elite Four have been getting consistently stronger. It's wonderful seeing Unova grow, even if it means we have to work harder.
The skills I pick up here will serve me well in other duties.
I wonder if any of my skills would carry over while sleepwalking...
We always prepare for the best or the worst, but never for things simply going decent. I suppose it does lack the drama.
This is far more riveting than many of the tea parties I've had to endure. Dare I say the company is better too?
I can sense the energy! One of you has an incredible hand!
Average simply won't do.
Hmmm. Given my resources I can really only hope from here.
I should just be grateful my cards aren't lousy.
I wish to thrive! Not simply get by...
I'll take it and just pretend it's the best I could have gotten.
There simply isn't a polite way to tell people when they're being boring... But I don't want to patronize them and feign interest.
Concern over wasting time tells me the priorities are still being figured out. Anything is capable of feeding growth.
I suppose being naked like this does really validate that I don't need to hide anything here. I try to be honest, but basic etiquette tends to get in the way.
So now that you've... seen me... how do I look? I'm doing okay, right?
Am I already getting used to this?
I'll maintain my concentration, no matter what's going on around me!
Does someone have something to keep me awake? Because this hand isn't doing anything for me.
People call me a showoff, but most of the time, I'm just pursuing whatever makes me happy and comfortable. If that creates a spectacle, then that's just a win-win, right?
I shouldn't get too attached to getting good results, it will only lead to future anger when I inevitably get unlucky.
Psychic powers are not what I'd consider a gift... But I refuse to let them be a curse!
I have an upcoming meeting to visit the Ribbon Syndicate so they can measure the "sheen of my Pokémon"... Believe me, it's as fun as it sounds.
It's inoffensive. That's the best I can say.
Routine can be such a fragile thing. That's why I try to stay conscious of everything, despite the safe allure of going on autopilot.
No one will remember me if I leave an average impression...
I had a blind date on the Nimbasa Ferris Wheel. All he talked about was hiking, and there was hardly even room for both of us! It was absolutely dreadful!
I wish I could levitate myself. The Unova Pokémon League has so many steep slopes, it's murder on one's legs.
I'm fine with average. We don't need to achieve perfection at every waking moment.
My favorite part of competing with strangers is never knowing what to expect.
I'm a skilled trainer, but there aren't many other things I have a natural talent for. Even then, it took a lot of work getting to where I am now.
No matter how hard I train, there's still plenty that's out of my control.
I feel like the word "talent" undermines how much hard work actually goes into mastering something.
I imagine I'll be dreaming about this not long from now.
Regardless of what comes my way, I'll be ready to handle it with grace and dignity!
I'll choose to interpret this glass as half full, despite my better judgment.
Surrounded by people... There was a time when that was only a dream of mine.
Can we get a round of applause for the dealer? Without their efforts, none of this would be possible!
I could go for a nice Castelia cone when this is done. Are you craving anything, ~unovan~?
So! ~Unovan~! Is there anyone back home you'd like to bump into here? You don't need to stay quiet with me! I'm great with secrets!
I've lived many different places, but none of there's something about the people of Unova that I can't live without. It's hard even remembering life before meeting ~unovan~!
I had a lovely dream last night, ~unovan~, and you were in it! I could tell you about it, but... well... how comfortable are you with the idea of your face being part of a Pokémon's body?
I had a lovely dream last night, ~unovan~, and you were in it... I won't bore you with details though, the part you played was rather minuscule.

I had an interesting dream last night, ~unovan~, and you were in it. I was just an ordinary trainer, and you'd taken my place in the Elite Four... {Mutter}You were also doing a better job than me...{!reset}
I wonder how things are going back in Sinnoh. It's been a long time since I've visted the mainland.
By the by, ~Sinnoh~. If you ever find yourself at the Battle Frontier, do send my best to Darach! I'm sure he'd be happy to serve you a nice cup of my family's specialty tea.
I'm not sensing any strong mystical power from this lake, but I would say it's just as pretty as the lakes back home, wouldn't you agree, ~Sinnoh~?
It's rather cliché for a criminal to be playing a game of cards, isn't it, ~criminal~? Then again, I suppose the same cliché holds true for the wealthy...
If you're trying to pull any stealthy tricks, ~criminal~, just remember I can read your aura.
I envy you, ~flier~. I can make other people float without issue, but no matter how hard I try, I can't seem to pick myself up!
I had a lapse of concentration... because of ~player~'s... thing. There, I said it. I hope you're proud of yourself, ~player~.
Where are all the horror stories about losing one's dignity? It's far more of a threat than any monster!

Here's a scary story for you. I lose. Badly. With my pride now in ruins, I retaliate with a gang of Sableye and steal all of your candy... That is unless someone is willing to sacrifice themselves to avert such a dark future!
Don't let the cutesiness of "Trick or Treat" distract you, it's still a threat, and one I'm very capable of honoring!
I just knew that Purrloin I saw on the way here would be bad luck!
What have I done to deserve being the target of such a mean trick?!
All of these frights are getting to be more than I can handle in one night!
Sooooo is anyone willing to switch seats? Um... No offense to you, ~Creep~...
(Just keep thinking about the walking Furret, and pretend ~creep~ isn't... lurking there... right next to you.)
N-not in front of the crowd!
I fear I may be making my public debut rather soon...
Am I really going to get naked in public before I've even... N-never mind!
There are no practice rounds... are there?
Really now? I wasn't expecting this bad of a start!
Arrogance is expecting to not make any mistakes, confidence comes from knowing I can adapt to any mistake, even a bad start!
Remind me what the forfeit is again?... Right... that's just as I thought.
Back in Unova, we only play games of skill. Isn't that right, ~unovan~? These luck based games are banned for good reason!
But if I lose then I have to...
This is not the time to be making simple mistakes!
I came here knowing I'd get exposed... but that doesn't exactly mean I'm ready.
Siiiiiiigh...
I want a refund...
There's always tomorrow's hand...
I won't lie to you, my cards are terrible.
Halfway to decent. Nowhere near good.
This isn't anywhere near what I predicted!
I shouldn't have daydreamed! But then again, it was rather pleasant...
I never really got to be a rookie trainer, so knowing very little about how a game works is... refreshing?
Very well then, I accept this challenge!
To be sensible, I'm not going to do well every hand.
Maybe a loss will spice things up a bit.
Even at a time like this, I should stay cool and collected.
Think about your training, Caitlin...
But I've come so far...
How am I doing? My face doesn't look strange, does it?
Humbug!
I would have at least taken mediocrity!
But that's not fair! There wasn't any skill involved!
Would it be telling if I stopped and took a moment for myself?
When I swap my cards, I expect to get something different in return, dealer...
Is it okay for me to be feeling a little nervous right now?
Ugh, fine. It's been a long day anyways...
How did I ever interpret this game as being easy?!
Wait.. I might be done for!
It's not like me to mess up at a critical moment!
Well... at least I did my best?
Channeling psychic energy lets you sense what's coming towards you... but cards are just cardboard. I can't predict their quality.
Too many of these and I'll be in trouble!
An outcome I couldn't change...
Any chance I've synchronized this bad hand with anyone else... no?
Just because I have control of my emotions doesn't mean I don't ever want to be mad...
This isn't good. If I don't figure something out quick I'm going to lose purely on odds and attrition.
I can't even look at these cards!
This robe is so heavy what, with all the steam in here. I wouldn't mind...
I may as well surrender this one. It's really not worth getting worked up over.
It really is scary here... would any be bothered if I... h-held their hand?
How horrid!
Oh look. Bad cards. How truly and horridly terrifying.
All these boos and screams make it easy for one to lose their composure. I really don't like being frightened.
Grimsley tricked me and swapped my candy for a hard stone this season. He's lucky I didn't fling it right back at him!
Don't let the cutesiness of "Trick or Treat" distract you, it's still a threat, and one I'm very capable of honoring!
It really is scary here... would any be bothered if I... h-held their hand?
I-I think I just saw something move in that tree! I-I'm not the only one, right?
I think it's time to add a bit more suspense! The next time I lose, I'll... I'll go completely bottomless! It's a promise!
Also... Yes, Corgi. Mating Press.
It was a joke, ~player~, but if that was real, you would have missed your chance with me! Keep it in mind.
This should be shocking. But seeing as Sakura is right there, I'm not very impressed.
I currently reside in the Unova region. It has a rather long history of clashing ideals, which I believe draws in very individualistic type people!
I grew up in the Sinnoh region. It's a cold place with a strong sense of tradition. It's pretty, but the culture doesn't quite fit my tastes.
There's a psychic Pokémon known as Mew that's exceptionally rare, as it will only show itself to those that emit a pure, non threating aura. One day, I'd love to be worthy of seeing it!
He doesn't have any other latent abilities, does he? We have a similarly powerful dragon Pokémon that swims through the sand and... well, Cynthia over there could actually tell you all about it.
Recently the mythic Light Stone and Dark Stone were unearthed. I'd recommend you to go see them, but... well, N can tell you more about it than I can.
I'm twenty three... I've never had need of an ID in my circles, and any desire I would have had to carry one has just been dashed by Moon.
I've played it a few times, but the only person I have to play it with... let's just say he frustrates me.
That's still better than I can ever hope to achieve. Me and bicycles have a... rather tangled and messy history.
So that's what a zombie looks like? Hm, that's nowhere near as grotesque as the story I read.
You'd both have the same potential, so I'd argue yes. For better or for worse, such a person would be an insight into what you're capable of.
Shauntal has given me enough reasons to be afraid of ghosts already! They're not all capable of that, are they?
We don't have anywhere like that in Unova... Glitz, glam, and a hint of danger! Consider me interested, Rouge!
Places like this tend to keep the lights on through the interest of a wealthy investor. My family has a few such facilities that break even thanks to food and souvenir sales.
I've seen psychic beings who are capable of projecting limbs, but those are, r-real aren't they?
I could have one of my Pokémon teleport you back. But I'd need to know the exact location, otherwise you'd likely end up... well anywhere else.
I could have one of my Pokémon teleport you back. Normally I'd need an exact location, but so long as there's a Pokémon center near you, it shouldn't be a problem.
What does "Triple Seven" sell? Actually, don't answer that! This sounds like it could be a fun little date and I'd like to be surprised!
I grew up in the Sinnoh region, but more and more I'm starting to see Unova as home. The cities are so lively and while some areas are a little dirty, the nature is still breathtaking!
I don't think she'd listen to a word I'd have to say and that'd probably be for the best. That girl... I needed a lot of space, and knowing my future self would have added only more pressure.
My! How naughty! Perhaps standing around in your underwear will incentive you to come up with a more effective strategy.
Hearing that should make me feel better about losing to a novice, but I think I dislike being tricked even more!
Grimsley does the exact same kind of thing. Why does everyone feel the need to be so deceptive when it comes to games of leisure?
Back when I visited Johto I used to fall asleep to the sound of Hoothoot outside. Such wonderful flying types, I'm surprised they are not psychic!
Honestly now! It's always "your hair's so pretty!" this! Or "wow, how do you comb it?!" that! Yet no one ever takes notice of how mindful I am of my weight!
While I may complain... I do like my hair... otherwise I wouldn't take care of it. I just wish people didn't fixate on it so much!
There's a place in Sinnoh called Mt. Coronet where all kinds of strange phenomena occur. Rifts in space sometimes open at the peak, and worse yet, it's infested with Zubat!
In Unova there's the Giant Chasm, where a terrible dragon supposedly comes to the village to eat children... It always sounded more like a made up scary bedtime story to me though.
Sounds like the kind of boy who's dense enought that it will take him hundreds of adventures before he actually gets it... Still, going off of what I've seen, boys like that do get there eventually!
He sounds plucked right out of an adventure novel! Strong principals, and a wild heart! Oh, how I'd love to be swept away on an adventure with someone like that!
Never knock a creative mind for making something "useless"... I've seen first hand how horrifying it can be when Shauntal tries to make her talents..."helpful."
He doesn't have any other latent abilities, does he? We have a similarly powerful dragon Pokémon that swims through the sand... and can apparently fly. It's actually rather mortifying.

...When I was a girl I was always afraid that a Kabutops skeleton was hiding in my closet, waiting to get me. I don't think I could ever grow comfortable with this Brook character, even if he is friendly!
That reminds me of Shauntal! She isn't the kind of person I initially envisioned being friends with, but now there's no one else I'd rather talk to about Elite Four work!
Cowardice isn't always a bad thing. For instance, a Pokémon that's timid tends to strike much quicker... Really most power just comes from making the most out of your personality traits.
Reminds me of how I feel about Grimsley. Knowing that deep down, he is a good person is actually more annoying. It denies me the simplicity of outright hating him.
The fact that he can turn human sounds delightful! I'd love to be able to hold a conversation with one of my Pokémon, even just once!
Gems don't do much for me, but anything made with platinum reminds me of all the mountains in Sinnoh... as well as the nights I fell asleep looking at their peaks.
Really now, gossip? That's not exactly my kind of thing! But none of these are people I'll ever meet so what's the harm?
Recently the mythic Light Stone and Dark Stone were unearthed. I'd recommend you to go see them, but they have both transformed into dragons...
I can tell... Erm, that is to say, that you're interested in my hair...! Most people seem to be...
(I'm picking up that Binah is quite dangerous... but so long as I don't provoke her... perhaps I can find some kind of common ground.))
Why don't you ask Grimsley? He's constantly trying to scam people despite the fact that he already has both money and status! You'd make quite the pair!
Oh... right. Pardon me, N. That was very inconsiderate of me to say.
This event is organized so I suppose the crowd is fine. I-it's not my preference, mind you, though I do I confess it's a little exciting. B-but only a little!
It's a bit risky for the two of us to be out here, isn't it ~celeb~? But I'm also glad I'm not the only person of note to be here.
That Snorlax doll is adorable! I've always wanted to meet a real one, but they are quite rare where I'm from!
Marshal's been trying to jump off cliffs to imitate Alder, it's simply idiotic! One time, if I hadn't been there to catch him, he would have broken a leg!

Next door, Marshal and his machines would keep me up at night. When I told him to keep it down, I found him the next morning building another wall in his room to insulate the sound... I mean, it worked, but isn't that a bit much?
I swear, Marshal has absolutely zero sense for self preservation! He's constantly sparring with his Pokémon, and when he gets injured from it, he's proud of it!
Shauntal has been trying to write her way into the romance market! I keep telling her to cut the ancient bachelor ghost from the Hisui region, but that girl is very stubborn about her tastes!

Shauntal can get a little nervous about her rough drafts so she reads them to me before I got to sleep. They used to scare me, but now I just find them so soothing.., her voice can make anything sound soft and wonderful!

Shauntal is the bravest person I know when it comes to the supernatural and deadly... but she's mortified of public speaking. I'm certain that if she were here, she'd faint before she could even remove her gloves.

Grimsley orders gourmet Pokémon food... but always sends the delivery boy to me for the tip! Is he aware of how awkward it is for me to wake up, and give that Deerling eyed boy a small fortune to compensate for his rudeness?! Every time?!
Never play a board game with Grimsley. He blatantly cheats when he's already winning! It's almost as if he just wants to show you what little chance you had in the first place!

Grimsley claims to be a sharp dresser and gentleman, so it baffles me as to why he has such an aversion to wearing socks. He's so stubborn about it, I once even caught him spraying cologne on his feet...
(~Floozy~ certainly is attractive... and spending the night with ~target.ifMale(him|her)~ wouldn't be too difficult... But do I really want to set the bar that low?)
Here we are! Down to the wire and putting it all on the line! It's been a pleasure, ~opponent~!
Everyone else has made it look like such a wonderful time, o-on the other hand, my competitive side wants to win... I can't take it! Let's just show our hands!
You know, I've always wanted to travel to Galar. Admiring the landscape... dining on the excellent cuisine... maybe having a free sample or two, ~galarian~, if you catch my drift?
My colleague Marshal is quite the character, it's difficult not to gossip about him... Then again, he'd likely see it less as "gossip" and more as "tales of valor" sooooooo...
People have called me a bit of a gossip from time to time, but is that so bad? My colleagues like Marshal do all kinds of exciting things, and they're not usually prone to sharring them!
My friend Shauntal recently based one of her horror stories on a very strange and personal dream I had... Maybe I should share something about her to strangers, see how she likes it!

Is it a rude assesment to call your friend strange...? Hm, well, Shauntal is a writer and there's no such thing as bad publicity! So maybe if I tell you something about her you can judge for yourself!
Things can get so embarrassing around... should I talk about him when he's not here? It is Grimsley, heavens know what he's said about me...
If I have not made it clear, me and my colleague Grimsley do not get along. He's just so... well, perhaps it would be clearer if I told you something he did, rather than just being vague.
Is this how you act all the time, ~Chuuni~?
I can read your true feel-- (Hold a moment! Her intentions... revealing that about ~yandere~ would be a horrible mistake!) N- never mind!
One time... I-I... sleepwalked into Grimsley's room and started taking a bath... with my clothes on. Frankly, I don't know if that detail makes it more or less embarrassing than the alternative.
W-Where's the suspense in that?! It backfired immediately!
I'm starting to think that that was only suspenseful for me... But I always honor my word!
It's nothing too complex, just a few hours a day brushing it, occasionally using some telekinesis to unknot the harder to reach areas.
Very well then, Dunban! I'll start simple, is it something from back home?
Alright, I'll bite, but I'll need some context. Is it someone you meet with frequently?
You're thinking about the ~background.surface~, Dunban. Your aura is unchanged, and I can literally see you looking at it.
Very well, Dunban. At the very least it may help distract me from what's about to happen.
Why thank you, you two! People don't usually compliment my attire back home at the League... or really anywhere for that matter! I certainly feel a lot more welcome now!
Hold a moment, I have a file?! Further more you researched me before coming here?!
I'd be hard pressed to say "no" to having tea with a man of your caliber, Leon! And I confess, Hu Tao, I do find your blunt eagerness to be charming in its own right!
I don't share it often, but I do enjoy both kinds of stories... Which kind really depends on various things, be it my mood, where I am, or the kind of day I've had...
You're both charming in your own way... goodness though, I prepare for a lot of things but not anything like this!
It seems me and Hu Tao are on similar pages with each other. It's not just how your charms either, both of you are emitting a very distinct aura, and I don't think I can leave either behind!
Likewise, I'm not too surprised to hear that about your ship. Complex thoughts and feelings are hardly exclusive to humans.
Sleep isn’t my only option to control my powers, but it is the coziest. I’d much rather snuggle with my Pokémon than mediate by myself.
Not quite, though it is always enjoyable to be mistaken for one.
Are you still caught up with that? If it makes you feel better, I'll show you something that's actually strange.
I wish I could say to" just meditate", but it's not that simple. You need some kind of concrete goal to work towards, which can be difficult to find without a guidance.
Rather bad form indeed! Heaven forbid a man notices the posture I work so hard on, or my eyes! Or anything else!
Thank you for the sympathy, Leon. I've been aiming to make up for all that lost time, so I'm delighted to be here!
You would think, but the ones best at flattery usually turn out to just be interested in a battle. It feels like the only thing people are interested in some days.
And just what do you mean by that, Leon? You're not trying to soften me up because of what I'm about to do, are you?
I don't need to read minds for that one, Leon. Care to share what you're thinking with the rest of us?
A... "Vision"? Having a long term goal is a source of power for me, but I have a feeling that's not what you're referring to.
It does help, though I mainly just use it to measure how seriously I need to take a challenger. Most battles I go purely off of my own skill and judgement.
How do you mean? I've only read about it from Shauntal, and it means something different everytime she writes about it.
So this is what you actually want. You're not the first you know, I have a colleague who's always pushing my buttons trying to get the exact same thing to happen!
I take it you're rather drawn to confidence, hm? Then how about I opt for "something else", and ensnare you further?
That um... depends on what you classify as a "date". Do you mean simply starting them, or seeing them through to completion?
I am... not, I'm afraid. My outfit at this layer is more so for my own comfort than for showing off to others, soooooooo...
Is that so? Well then, Natsuki, would now be a good time to confess that I'm a little envious that you have naturally pink hair? It is my favorite color, and your hue is dazzlingly vibrant!
Every time, barring the... kicking. Sleep wouldn't be such a favored activity for me without my Musharna providing me lovely dreams.
You know what? Sure, Hu Tao, I'll bite. Give me your most forward thoughts, and I promise I won't get perturbed by them!
Yes that can work, so long as it stays close to my current color scheme... How did you arrive at putting me in a suit anyways?
It's akin to having a flying weight perpetually tied to my waist. I’ve gotten used to it, but I need substantial mental energy to ensure it doesn't fly out of control and hit someone in the head...
And I have the answer. Yes, it's difficult to take care of, and no, you can't touch it!
Some are talented enough to foster power through meditation, but that's not what happened with me. I was born with these powers, the mediation just ensures I don't make anything explode...
Stress still comes to me just like anyone else, I simply take things a day at a time. What kinds of things are weighing on your mind today, Nami?
Every day!! My arena doubles as my bedroom, so almost every one of my battles opens with me awaking from a nap.
Are matches truly necessary? I think your hair is quite...um... pretty, Perona. We don't need to compete like this.
Goodness no! These abilities and my fortune were simply what I was born into, I haven't had anyone poke me with sticks or anything like that!
These abilities surfaced naturally when I was just a girl... thinking on it, my family's wealth is likely what protected me from experiments and the like!
Hm? Is there an issue, Cheryl? I'm not sensing anything... wait a minute...

There are many others with similar abilities... Some are born with them, others atain them through years of training, but I've never met another human at quite the same level as me, for better or for worse.
A... suit? Look, Elesa, I'm quite content with how I dress so... do you have a problem with that? I don't really understand this insistence to redefine my look.
I admit, my life is usually moving from one comfort to another, but there's still many obstacles to face day by day... Even if a revolving door isn't exactly dire, it's still very inconvenient.
This again, Elesa? I know our looks are important here, but I was hoping to discuss almost anything else.
I-I'm getting cold feet... Is this something I should really be doing?
I've had dreams about this sort of thing... b-but I never thought I'd actually be doing it!
W-what? Ohhhh I was dazing off because of the steam! That's by design, isn't it!
I'll do better next time. That's a promise!
Years ago, I would have thrown a fit over simply losing the first hand. Looking back on it now, it's ridiculous.
Hm hm hmmmm... Just a little longer? Okay, fine.
Hee hee! Alright! But just let me strike a pose like this one more time while I still have the dress!
Finally! It was going so well, I was worried one of you may of been planning some kind of trick!
And here I was starting to get cozy! There's nothing frightful about comfort!
All this winning had me forget that I'm actually on the verge of something... rather embarrassing.
I suppose I've been doing quite well, so it's only fair.
Finally my turn? I've been waiting to introduce myself proper you know.
I was starting to wonder if I'd take any hits. A sweep is rather boring.
Don't get disheartend! I'm sure with enough hard work and luck you'll be able to finish this game while at least getting to see more of my collarbone!
I was rather enjoying my time being ahead, but getting too far ahead can be very isolating.
Just hearing that I'm a psychic isn't much fun now, is it? Perhaps a demonstration is in order.
I have a little trick for taking these ribbons off, and no, it doesn't have anything to do with my excellent reach and flexibility.
I'm skilled in quite a few areas, but there's one specific talent that comes to me very naturally. Let me show you!
It's all going well, but I can't let that make me apathetic to the possibility of a losing streak...
I really respect it when people hold out against tough opponents! Congratulations on securing this win!
I was almost tempted to lend one of you my robe out of pity. Too bad! Into the pile it goes!
I think it's time for me to show some skin. Stalling any longer would only be rude to the rest of you.
O-oh! It's already that time? I was starting to get the idea I might win without having to...
I suppose I am in the lead so I have no right to complain... R-right, I'll get to it!
It's getting rather desperate, isn't it? We're all so close...
There goes the one advantage I have left... I really need to concentrate for this last hand!
That's all the losses I can take... While staying in my comfort zone at least...
O-oh. That's right. My leggings are see through...
Boo! What? If you're going to try to scare me, I may as well try to scare back!
I had so much fun wearing this dress! I really should dress like this more often!
I'm glad to be a novice here. When you have expertise in something, it becomes harder to relate to others.
My first loss. I don't think I'm doing too bad as a beginner!
I may be feeling brave today, but losing still stings!
There goes my last shred of dignity...
But without my hat I'll be so much less fanciful. Are you sure that's something you want?
Just taking my cap off would be boring, So how about I show you all a trick to go with it?
My mistakes are starting to catch up with me...
Losing used to make me so angry, but I found focusing less on my loss and more on my opponent's victory helped a lot.
That's all the losses I can take... While staying in my comfort zone at least...
Oh my... It just clicked how exposed I'll be without my robe. W-which is fine!
What would he say to encourage me... Oh, I said that out loud, I was just thinking about my butler.
Oh um... I'm haven't felt this anxious in a while, it's almost nostalgic.
I'm aware I lost! You don't need to all stare at me like that!
I'm starting to think the pacing of the game would of been fine without my little stunt... My boots would be helpful right here.
Am I really this out of my element when I'm not in my pajamas? That's something I should really work on.
I could stretch my layers out to stand a better chance... No, I'll stick to my original plan and challenge myself.
I'm not in an advantageous position to start with am I? Interesting! It's been a while since I've had a challenge!
I'm already behind? Perhaps I should introduce myself then to avoid a shoddy first impression...
Yes, I didn't bring eight layers here, and yes I don't use six Pokémon! Excuse me if that puts me at a disadvantage just because I believe in quality over quantity!
Oh no, don't worry. I was hoping to be at an immediate disadvantage! It makes the game more interesting!
If I keep losing like this, I'm going to gain a shoddy poker reputation.
Losing is getting a bit repetitive.
Beans!
Hm. Maybe I should have kept my shoes. I'm not in a great position here.
My skills aren't exactly shining right now, are they? How about a trick then?
Already? I can't buy myself another round, can I?
Is this how it feels to fight without any Full Restores? Consider me not a fan!
May the punishment fit the crime... I played horrendously!
B-b-b-but I've been handling loss with dignity and grace! Doesn't that count for anything?
I'm starting to think this may be a scam to get sophisticated women out of their underwear!
I was prepared for this, but you know... with other people naked with me.
Well it's rather difficult to imagine life without them. Levitation speaks for itself, and reading people's auras is a great way to gauge character early on.
You're emitting a very warm glow, so it must make you happy! Perhaps some kind of companion, like your favorite Pokémon?
That slight correction in your posture is rather telling then. It must be someone you have developed a respect for, yet your aura is also very warm... Perhaps you harbor feelings for this person?
Have I even gotten one honest answer out of you? It may just be a game, Dunban, but I don't take too kindly to being made into a fool!
Oh be still my heart, Dunban! Had I been able to read such passionate feelings from the beginning, this whole thing would of been vastly different! It's my bosom that occupies your mind!
I won't be showing any psychic tricks tonight. Well... except for maybe a prank or two.
Give me a moment. I normally wear clothes that are quite easy to slip off, undoing this is still rather troublesome.
I may be running out of essentials already, but that's simply the price one pays for magnificent style!
I never got to celebrate Halloween growing up... and it wasn't even because of my powers, my parents simply thought it was bad form.
Just watch! I came here to have a magnificent presence, and I'll do so with or without this costume!
I don't normally wear undergarments like this you know, consider yourselves lucky to meet me during such a season!
I'm not that nervous. I'm just... just don't judge me too hard for my undergarments.
When frightened in the dead of night, the only way out is forward! That said I wouldn't mind having someone to cling to...
I honored my bet, so I'm expecting something just as risky from all of you! That's half the fun of the season, isn't it?
{Mutter}Why do I even bother making such bold claims when they always backfire in the worst of ways...{!reset}
Trick or Treat was it? Very well, I'll give you all something to drool over!
This bra isn't doing much to add to my spook factor, is it? No need for it in that case!
Exactly! Pajamas are what we wear when we are at our most comfortable, and for me comfort and grace are one in the same, so why change into something different?
Well, Hu Tao, he likely has escorted his fair share of wealthy damsel types, so maybe we can cut him some slack... Still, Leon, shame on you for treating me like an escort!
Oh, one thing I should mention about these drinks, due to my powers I tend to avoid alco- pardon, but... is that an aura of competition I am sensing from you, Hu Tao?
Neither of you are making this easy! Leon's tale sounds like the perfect date setup, but yours, Hu Tao, is the kind of story where I'd just have to know the ending!
I'm... oh my... I'm hardly used to such forward advances from just one person! None the less while I'm... well... you know...
Ahem! So! I propose we all go on a little date tonight, and have tea, brandy or whatever our heart's desire! Afterall, we've all already come this far...
Pardon? My hat premium silk from a shiny Swadloon! It's the comfiest hat a girl can ask for and I'll have you know all of my Pokémon adore sleeping on it!
No need to be afraid, Natsuki. I've spent years honing these powers; they won't hurt anyone so long as I maintain control of my emotions.
All you did was ask a question, a rather flattering one at that, so why are you putting yourself down?
I've been mastering these powers since I was a young girl; it would take something truly shocking for me to lose control.
And I consider myself quite lucky to have met you here tonight as well. You're not the typical man I envisioned playing a game like this.
I can't say I drink too often. Not that I don't want to, it's just... you know... a bit dangerous for someone like me.
That's actually... very sweet, Leon. Genuine compliments deserve genuine rewards, so I'll make this extra special, just for you.
I thought we were getting away from the hair talks, Leon. Though, that is something I haven't heard anyone ask before.
Oh... well, yes. My powers awoke in me at a young age, and levitation is one of them. Though I can also read people's auras...
And just what do you mean by that, Hu Tao? I should warn you I don't take kindly to foes who think they can trick me with low blow tactics.
Me and my Pokémon both are weak to them, so we tend to avoid them. Though it is rather frustrating to have an entire plane of knowledge that's inaccessible to me.
Initially it was a bit more selfish than that. I simply wanted to be able to play with people and Pokémon alike, but was worried that they might reject me.

Don't let repetitive comments about your most prominent physical features bother you, don't open the conversation with talks about finance, and don't go on Ferris wheels. Oh, also don't meet with people with similar talents who may try to upstage you, don't flirt by insinuating you can pick them up with your mind, don't tell them they could do with a bit of exercise, don't criticize their personality traits on the first date, and please please don't take them to a venue with a cozy atmosphere or you may fall asleep. Expect profile pictures to be at least a few years outdated, and if their profile says they are interested in "travel" and "Stoutlands" then they aren't taking it seriously.
There's no need to get all morose about it now. People do get curious about my abilities, and pushing my buttons is a very easy way to see them in motion.
Still, mastering one's feelings allows you to control how you react to these kinds of situations! I could let anxiety take hold, and meekly shed my gown... or I could do this!
Apologies, but you set yourself up perfectly for that one. Besides, while I enjoy receiving compliments, I find handing them out without shame to be far more fulfilling!
My darling little Musharna would never conjure something so wicked! Though the nights I do dream for myself are... not so different from what you're describing.
I'm normally picky and would turn down such an approach, but tonight's special! Besides, I have my own curiosities...
Give me normal clothes for a normal photo shoot then. I seriously hope I don't need to explain why giving me something extravagant would be complete overkill...
You're starting to sell me on the idea, but isn't this somewhat encroaching on Cynthia's look? I don't want people to needlessly compare us...
My apologies, I don't normally fly off the handle like that. You're just the fourth person to mention my hair today.
Applying an excessive amount of force is actually far easier than a gentle touch. Even now, I'm taking extra care to not crumple up my ribbons.
And an impressive sense at that! Normally I'm able to detect such powers from a mile away, but there's something different about you...
I've also associated my abilitites with negative things in the past, so I hope you're not too jealous, Cheryl. You're abilities have their own merits.
Pardon? This hat premium silk from a shiny Swadloon! It's the comfiest hat a girl can ask for and I'll have you know all of my Pokémon adore sleeping on it!
Your hat's unusual quality makes it tempting, but I must respectfully decline. My Reuniclus used to sleep in this hat, and she'd be horridly sad if I gave it away!
Do you like my outfit? My friend Shauntal helped me put it together, horror is her specialty!
Despite my resources, this outfit actually took a rather long time to make. I'm eternally grateful to my horror enthused friend for making it possible!
Well... Me playing the game is already public, so I may as well see it through. Would everyone here like a glimpse of what a true lady looks like?
You've all put your reputations on the line, so why should I be any different? Besides, my family always honors their bets.
It's like starting a battle, eager to see your opponents strategy, and then they open with a Sucker Punch. Predictable, but still disappointing.
Even when an Elite Four battle starts out horribly, you're not allowed to forfeit early. The rules dictate that you have to see it through to the end to show the opponent good form...
I'm from a family of prestigious battlers, though I have only started battling a few years ago. I've come quite far already.
As a member of the Elite Four, I must represent the best of the Unova region. To do any less would betray Alder's fine sense of judgment.
I only have the confidence I have now because of my butler. Funny isn't it? Darach always believed in me, and even gave me my first Pokémon!
I used to only watch competitions. My butler, Darach, battled for me everyday, and I'd get so angry for him whenever he lost. Still, he always found a way to cheer me up.
Oh... I know it's temporary, but I don't like parting with my robe. It makes me feel elegant, even when I'm laying facefirst on a pillow.
I'm glad my Pokémon are not here to see this! They may not all have perception of clothing, but seeing me lose always upsets them!
I train every day all day, yet still I choose to compete in my free time... I suppose some switchs simply cannot be turned off.
Levitating small objects was one of the first things I had to master with my psychic powers. Impressive, isn't it?
"Move it gently, with compassion, no different than how you'd hold a small child." I would write these kinds of things down when learning how to control my powers.
People tend to fixate on the great power that comes with psychic abilities, but it's the little quality of life improvements that make me grateful for them.
Being psychic is like seeing the threads that connect everything together. You tug at the threads when appropriate, but often I prefer to sit back and observe them.
I used to fear reading the auras of others until I began raising my Munna and realized that all she wanted was to be held. Once I could read that, I began seeing similar sensitivities in others...
I appreciate all of your company... I didn't have any friends growing up, all of their parents were afraid I might hurt them.
I know it's simple, but I have been double dipping with my previous losses. I think I've earned some reprieve.
I always have to tie this thing so tight... having my robe fly open by accident is a humiliation I can't afford.
So many invisible psychic knots in this world... yet I still struggle to untie the very simple material one around my waist.
Ironic, isn't it? This sash is easily the most mundane thing I've removed, yet it shall reveal the most skin!
My reputation may be on the line here... but what's a reputation without a little spice?
Just one moment, taking this off is never simple as it should be. I can't exactly pull it over my head.
I haven't gone on many dates, and the few I've had weren't exactly successful... This is just as foreign to me as it is nerve-wracking.
I'm well aware of how conservative my previous strips have been, so tell me, ~player~... Are you ready to see all of this come off at once?
I'm already showing so much... So why does this last step feel so daunting?
I knew it might come to this, and I'm prepared for it! Just... give me one moment.
Getting the last of it off feels... rather good actually. I'll have to be careful not to make a habbit out of this!
I do put a lot of work into maintenance, so I confess there's a part of me that's happy someone will finally be able to see that!
Is that an invitation, Dunban? I'd be flattered to take my best shot at it, if you're willing to make a game out of it.
I was almost so certain though. The warmth was coming from your palm, which usually indicates petting or holding something precious...
If that's the case can you explain why your aura just got a few ticks warmer? Not to pry, but I usually get these kinds of things right.
Speaking as though I couldn't already figure out the rest... You get one more chance, Dunban.
That's great, Dunban. Truly magnificent. I really feel lucky getting testing my psychic abilities on a mind as sharp as yours.
With the frills gone from my outfit, I must look much more unassuming, yes? Underestimate me at your own peril!
Be honest with me, do I look silly? I know you're never supposed to see this part of the dress, but I do feel quite cozy!
T-that's not exactly a polite thing to notice, Hu Tao! We were simply having an earnest little conversation about nightwear, isn't that right, Leon? ...Leon?
We could make quite the pair tonight, Hu Tao! And... wait, Leon, what do you mean about that? I may need you to tell me if she's scheming anything!
(I should tell them I don't drink, but...) R-really now, there's no need to compete over this! (Best to save that when they are done!!)
Would it be so taboo to want both...? That is- I mean, to get to perhaps read together with the both of you! I-I'm not proposing anything outlandish am I?
You two are coming at me at such a rate that it feels like my head is going to explode! Just... give me a round or two so I hear and manage my own embarrassing thoughts!
And by the by, ~Player~, that invitation extends to you as well. If you think it's the kind of thing you'd be able to handle that is!
Well, who would I be to turn down such an offer? Especially when it's from a gentleman who's showing himself to be... rather flexible.
I feel like I only just scratched the surface, but point is, there's a lot to share. I can write it down on a napkin or something later if you wish.
The most valuable powers are the one's that often go unseen, Natsuki. I'm certain you possess similar potential!
Seriously, don't worry about it. If anything, hearing such a thing makes my day just that much more brighter.
Mastering psychic powers takes both discipline and good will, should either fail... well, you get incidents like what happened in Kanto.
Well aren't you quite the charmer? Still, save your A game material for later, dear. The only thing "conventional" will land you at this stage is a cup of warm tea.
I still look elegant? I've never really done a stunt like that, so I was expecting to be somewhat clumsy.
After hearing your genuine compliments, your hokey ones stand out much more. Still, I'd be lying if I said I didn't find the attention flattering.
I don't need my powers to know when a sinister individual is scheming something, Hu Tao. If that's how you want to play it though, I'll bite.
Your words are befuddling, but your aura is... Oh my! T-that is not what I meant by "low blow tactics"!
Oh I'm sorry, I thought you were asking me a question, not setting up an elaborately waltzing your way into a flirt! Would it pain you to be more direct, Hu Tao?
I may need to work on accepting compliments, but you still need to raise the bar and be a bit less transparent with your efforts, Leon.
The important part is that you do it for yourself, Natsuki. Remember that from time to time, and you'll be fine!
That's one of the better remarks I've received about my hair, and believe me, I keep track... You're a natural class act, Natsuki, and don't let anyone tell you otherwise.
Well... I never said it was devoid of any charm. More often than not, it's simply that the people who dish it out have a low tolerance for it themselves.
Your forward flirtation is more than enough to get my legs shaking! ...That is what you're talking about, is it not?
And wonder if you can actually back up that talk? Poets may hide behind airy to make up for shortcomings in other places... So please, show me what you can do!
Elesa...? Hello? If you're going to ignore me, at least ignore me with an idea that's good, and not whatever... that is.
People always assume such power is how I keep my hair in check... I tire of such theories. Once, someone even asked if I use metal wires to hold it in place.
Actually, I do fight like this! A majority of my opponents come straight to my room where I lift them on on a little platform and emerge from the curtains. It's quite the spectacle!
Actually, I do fight like this! Seeing as most of my work is mental, I prioritize comfort to ensure I stay cool and collected!
It's a gauntlet for skilled trainers to judge if they are worthy of facing the champion. Each of us tests for different traits: creativity, wit, willpower, and my specialty—composure!
Parents in the upper circles start to panic when they see a child who hasn't combed their hair proper... So a girl who could knock vases over with a wince wasn't going to with any of them.
You're flattering, though don't go underestimating yourself. Keep in mind, you read me first! For someone as adaptable as you, that's quite the advantage!
And i-it's as simple as that! (I hope I stuck the landing there alright...)
That's... I mean... well,.. Okay fine! You may have a point. But if you make me wear a suit, I want to at least pick it out! ... And I want it to be pink!
That said, Magician, if you wish to borrow my cap for a little, then feel free to! Just promise not to pull anything strange from it, hm?
There. I honored the stupid little wager. Happy?
I don't exactly blame them. Still, I wish to meet them once again, just so I can show them who I've become.
Things are different now though. I have some truly wonderful Pokémon by my side, and I get to meet new people everyday! I'm happy to be where I am now.
I'll be keeping my hair ornament, by the by. I want to look at least a little in season, even if I lose everything.
Even if I can't scare you, I hope I can at the very least still make your heart flutter!
I was told the most important part of horror is pacing, so I'll add my boots to the pile. Scandalous, I know!
Oh my! It seems I accidently took my boots off as well! Why do horror protagonists always make such silly mistakes?
It could make for a fun little prank if we had these boots sticking out from under a house. I'd just need to find one small enough to levitate.
If there's anything I've learned in recent years though, it's that a little bit of bad form does the heart good. Right, ~player~?
What? It helps keep me warm! That's all there is to it, really!
I may have gotten this idea from a certain Champion I know. How does it look on me, ~player~?
It's a bit drafty here, isn't it? Would anyone like to huddle up for some warmth?
